reference.title: DITA-OT parameters
reference.shortdesc: Certain parameters apply to all DITA-OT transformations. Other parameters are common to the HTML-based transformations. Some parameters apply only to specific transformation types. These parameters can be passed as options to the dita command using the -Dparameter-name=value syntax or included in build scripts as Ant properties.

section.p: If your toolkit installation includes custom plug-ins that define additional parameters, you can add entries to the following topics by rebuilding the DITA-OT documentation.
